head.supplied: ¶ It appears that the required paper cannot be procured in less quantity than 25 reams, & that the balance in the hands of the Agent Genl. cannot therefore be applied to this purpose. ¶ ¶ Referred t...

div.p: 81/R48385, unit 915, VPRS 1207/P000 inward registered correspondence, VA 865 Department of the Treasurer, Public Record Office, Victoria.

It appears that the required paper cannot be procured in less quantity than 25 reams, & that the balance in the hands of the Agent Genl. cannot therefore be applied to this purpose.
See M to W. Odgers, 31 January 1881, requesting purchase of plate paper. The Agent General informed the Under Treasurer in a letter dated 19 May 1881 that Thomas De la Rue & Co, from whom the previous supply had been obtained, could not supply less than 25 reams of the paper.

Referred to the Govt Botanist to note
See also M to T. Wilson, 6 August 1881 (in this edition as 81-08-06a).
